# GSL water quality spatial variations {#wq-spatial}

## WQ boxplots by site
### Salinity
```{r, sal-boxplot-site}
sal_boxplot_site=
	plot_ly(wq_data, x=~site_no) %>% 
		add_trace(type='box', y=~Salinity_gL, name=~SiteName) %>% 
		layout(title = "GSL salinity by site",
			xaxis = list(title = "USGS site number"),
			yaxis = list(side = 'left', title = 'Salinity (g/L)')
		) %>% 
		config(displaylogo = FALSE,
			modeBarButtonsToRemove = c(
				'sendDataToCloud',
				'hoverClosestCartesian',
				'hoverCompareCartesian',
				'lasso2d',
				'select2d'
			)
		)

sal_boxplot_site

```


### Nutrients
```{r, nut-boxplot-site}
sal_boxplot_site=
	plot_ly(wq_data, x=~site_no) %>% 
		add_trace(type='box', y=~Total_phosphorus_mgL, name=~SiteName) %>% 
		add_trace(type='box', y=~Filtered_phosphorus_mgL, name=~SiteName) %>% 
		add_trace(type='box', y=~Total_nitrogen_mgL, name=~SiteName) %>% 
		add_trace(type='box', y=~Filtered_nitrogen_mgL, name=~SiteName) %>% 
		layout(title = "GSL water quality by site",
			xaxis = list(title = "USGS site number"),
			yaxis = list(side = 'left', title = 'Daily discharge (cfs)')
		) %>% 
		config(displaylogo = FALSE,
			modeBarButtonsToRemove = c(
				'sendDataToCloud',
				'hoverClosestCartesian',
				'hoverCompareCartesian',
				'lasso2d',
				'select2d'
			)
		)

sal_boxplot_site

```



### Chlorophyll a
```{r, wq-boxplot-site}
sal_boxplot_site=
	plot_ly(wq_data, x=~site_no) %>% 
		add_trace(type='box', y=~Salinity_gL, name=~SiteName) %>% 
		add_trace(type='box', y=~Total_phosphorus_mgL, name=~SiteName) %>% 
		add_trace(type='box', y=~Filtered_phosphorus_mgL, name=~SiteName) %>% 
		add_trace(type='box', y=~Filtered_nitrogen_mgL, name=~SiteName) %>% 
		add_trace(type='box', y=~Total_nitrogen_mgL, name=~SiteName) %>% 
		add_trace(type='box', y=~Chlorophyll_a_ugL, name=~SiteName) %>% 
		layout(title = "GSL water quality by site",
			xaxis = list(title = "USGS site number"),
			yaxis = list(side = 'left', title = 'Daily discharge (cfs)')
		) %>% 
		config(displaylogo = FALSE,
			modeBarButtonsToRemove = c(
				'sendDataToCloud',
				'hoverClosestCartesian',
				'hoverCompareCartesian',
				'lasso2d',
				'select2d'
			)
		)

sal_boxplot_site

```
